title: NASA Astronaut to Answer Questions from Students in Florida
summary: Students from Dade City, Florida, will have the chance to connect with NASA astronaut Nichole Ayers as she answers prerecorded science, technology, engineering, and mathematics-related questions from aboard the International Space Station. title: GITAI creates US defense subsidiary to chase prime government contracts
summary:
GITAI has created a defense-focused subsidiary at its Torrance, California headquarters to pursue prime contractor roles in U.S. government contracts, the space robotics specialist announced April 8.

title: GomSpace and Neuraspace partner to advance satellite collision avoidance
summary:
GomSpace, a Danish smallsat maker, announced plans April 8 to integrate space traffic management tools from Portugal’s Neuraspace into its satellite operations platform to help avoid collisions in increasingly congested orbits.
